```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# change figure resolution
knitr::opts_chunk$set(dpi=300)

# load packages
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

### Heatmap with ggplot
```{r heatmap}
heatmap <- ggplot(data = faithfuld) +
  geom_tile(aes(x = waiting,
                y = eruptions,
                fill = density))


heatmap
```
